
SELECT ST_AsText(ST_ConvexHull(
	ST_Collect(ST_GeomFromText('MULTIPOINT(-118.2888888 34.03, -118.2908856 34.0321840, -118.2887740 34.0250604, -118.2895881 34.0193110, -118.2891968 34.0211031, -118.2821808 34.0188389, -118.2914331 34.0220260, -118.2848322 34.0250543, -118.2853864 34.0205334, -118.2864794 34.0186171, -118.2853220 34.0230914, -118.2830609 34.0215886)')
)) );
